caption.p: GCÃ—GC-TOFMS volatile profiles of coriander ( top). Separation of a potent floral, coriander-like odour cluster in coriander leaf ( bottom). Substances were identified as E-2-dodecanal (A), E-2-dodecen-1-ol (B) and 1-dodecanol (C). Source: adapted with permission from Eyres et al. [ 50, 51].
